<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Populate Scheduled Day 1 of close</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_fin_accounting_period');
gr.addNullQuery('schedule_day_1_of_close');
gr.query();
while(gr.next()) {
	var dateEngine = new DateEngine(gr.getValue('schedule'));
	var day1OfClose = gr.getValue('day_1_of_close');
	gr.setValue('schedule_day_1_of_close', dateEngine.calculateScheduleDay1OfClose(day1OfClose));
	gr.setWorkflow(false);
	gr.update();
}]]></script>
